Adapter.name: OIG Account Create
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Creates an account for an Identity in Oracle Identity Governance.

AdapterResponseCode.name: SUCCESS
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Account has been created for Identity in Oracle Identity Governance.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OIM-00001
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An unhandled framework exception has occurred

AdapterResponseCode.name: OIM-00002
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: A non-recoverable exception has occured.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OIM-00003
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Execution aborted.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OIM-00011
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Passed argument must not be null.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OIM-00021
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: IT Resource not found.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OIM-00022
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: IT Resource ambiguously defined.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OIM-00023
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Mandatory IT Resource attribute is missing.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OIM-00024
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Mandatory IT Resource attribute cannot be null or empty.

AdapterResponseCode.name: ICF-00031
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Host to Connector Server is unknown.

AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Could create network connection to Connector Server host.

AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Could create secure network connection to Connector Server host.

AdapterResponseCode.name: ICF-00034
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Error encountered while connecting to Connector Server.

AdapterResponseCode.name: ICF-00035
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Connection to Connector Server got timed out.

AdapterResponseCode.name: ICF-00036
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: The problem may be with physical connectivity or Connector Server is not alive.

AdapterResponseCode.name: ICF-00037
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Credential is incorrect, system failed to get access to Connector Server with supplied credential.

AdapterResponseCode.name: ICF-00041
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Connector Bundle not found.

AdapterResponseCode.name: ICF-00042
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Configuration option is not transferable.

AdapterResponseCode.name: ICF-00043
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Configuration option is required.

AdapterResponseCode.name: ICF-00044
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Configuration option not found.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OCF-00001
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An unhandled exception has occured.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OCF-00003

AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Error initializing key manager factory (operation failed).

AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Error initializing key store (provider not registered).

AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Error initializing key manager factory (algorithm not supported).

AdapterResponseCode.name: OCF-00055
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Neither key password nor key store password has been set for key store.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OCF-00061
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Neither key password or key store password has been set for key store.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OCF-00062
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Error initializing Trust Store (provider not registered).

AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Error initializing Trust Store (algorithm to check key store integrity not found).

AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Cannot find Trust Store file.

AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Error loading Trust Store from file.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OCF-00081
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Configuration property required.

AdapterResponseCode.name: OCF-00091
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Host to Service Provider Server is unknown.

AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Could create network connection to Service Provider Server host.

AdapterResponseCode.name: JES-00001

AdapterResponseCode.name: JES-00004
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Feature is not yet implemented

AdapterResponseCode.name: JES-00023
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: The filter criteria applied is invalid.

AdapterVariable.name: targetSystem
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The technical properties to establish a connection.

AdapterVariable.name: processInstance
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The Process Instance Key providing the data for this provisioning tasks.

AdapterVariable.name: processTask
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The Process Task Key providing the metadata for this provisioning tasks.

AdapterVariable.name: provisioningDescriptor
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The path to the Metadata Descriptor specifying the Attribute Mapping of fields and their transformation that part of a provisioning task.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Facade provided by Identity Manager

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Process Instance Key providing the data for this provisioning adapter.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::3:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Process Task Key providing the data for this provisioning adapter.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: An appropriate response message. This has to be tested for SUCCESS. In any other case the process has to be aborted.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The path to the Metadata Descriptor specifying the Attribute Mapping of fields and their transformation that part of a provisioning task.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The system identifier of the IT Resource used by this Task Adapter.
